#summary The rel="license" attribute indicates that the referenced document is a license that governs the current document.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

`rel="license"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="license"` attribute on these elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||

== Further reading ==

  * [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/#license The rel="license" link type in HTML 5]
  * [http://microformats.org/wiki/rel-license The rel="license" microformat]
